com.software.reuze

Interface f_i_Files


  • public interface f_i_Files
    Provides standard access to the filesystem, classpath, Android SD card, and Android assets directory.
    Author:
    mzechner, Nathan Sweet

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  f_i_Files.FileType
      Indicates how to resolve a path to a file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      f_Handle absolute(String path)
      Convenience method that returns a f_i_Files.FileType.Absolute file handle.
      f_Handle classpath(String path)
      Convenience method that returns a f_i_Files.FileType.Classpath file handle.
      f_Handle external(String path)
      Convenience method that returns a f_i_Files.FileType.External file handle.
      String getExternalStoragePath()
      Returns the external storage path directory.
      f_Handle getFileHandle(String path, f_i_Files.FileType type)
      Returns a handle representing a file or directory.
      f_Handle internal(String path)
      Convenience method that returns a f_i_Files.FileType.Internal file handle.
      boolean isExternalStorageAvailable()
      Returns true if the external storage is ready for file IO.

    • Method Detail

      • getFileHandle

        f_Handle getFileHandle(String path,
                     f_i_Files.FileType type)
        Returns a handle representing a file or directory.
        Parameters:
        type - Determines how the path is resolved.
        Throws:
        GdxRuntimeException - if the type is classpath or internal and the file does not exist.
        See Also:
        f_i_Files.FileType

      • classpath

        f_Handle classpath(String path)
        Convenience method that returns a f_i_Files.FileType.Classpath file handle.

      • internal

        f_Handle internal(String path)
        Convenience method that returns a f_i_Files.FileType.Internal file handle.

      • external

        f_Handle external(String path)
        Convenience method that returns a f_i_Files.FileType.External file handle.

      • absolute

        f_Handle absolute(String path)
        Convenience method that returns a f_i_Files.FileType.Absolute file handle.

      • getExternalStoragePath

        String getExternalStoragePath()
        Returns the external storage path directory. This is the SD card on Android and the home directory of the current user on the desktop.

      • isExternalStorageAvailable

        boolean isExternalStorageAvailable()
        Returns true if the external storage is ready for file IO. Eg, on Android, the SD card is not available when mounted for use with a PC.
